testCases.name: Document Type
testCases.description: Says whether this page is written in HTML5
testCases.success: This page is configured for HTML5.
testCases.failure: This page is not configured for HTML5.

testCases.name: AppCache
testCases.description: A cache of resources to save from your site. These resources can be loaded locally instead of downloaded again, making the next time they visit take significantly less time to load.

testCases.name: Description
testCases.description: The description of your website, often used as a summary
testCases.failure: This page is missing a description.
